provider.description: Provider to be used to connect to the router

neighbor_ids.description: list of neighbor ids to be deleted in the router
neighbor_ids.usage: List of the neighbors to be deleted.

bgp_id.description: Bgp instance under which neighbors has to be deleted
bgp_id.usage: BGP neighbor will be deleted from the bgp instance specified using this parameter.

vrf.description: Vrf name under which neighbors is to be deleted
vrf.usage: Name of VRF under which neighbor is to be deleted. Empty string to delete neighbor under BGP
